StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProdRecPoolDischargeByFiscalYear]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileId uniqueidentifier, @FiscalYear int AS
BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @StartDate date.me DECLARE @EndDate date.me SET @StartDate = CONVERT(varchar(4), @FiscalYear-1) + '-10-1' SET @EndDate = CONVERT(varchar(4), @FiscalYear)+ '-9-30'
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @RecruiterId uniqueidentifier; SELECT @RecruiterId = RecruiterId FROM USMC.TrainingFile WHERE ID = @TrainingFileId
SELECT c.CONTRACT_ID, c.DISCHARGE_DATE, n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID INTO #Contract FROM MCRISS.dbo.Person AS p INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Marine_Candidate AS mc ON p.PERSON_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Nwa AS n ON mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Contract AS c ON n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.DISCHARGE_REASON dr ON dr.DISCHARGE_CODE = c.DISCHARGE_CODE INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Candidate_Status AS cs on c.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Status_Disposi.on AS sd on sd.Disposi.on_Code = cs.Disposi.on_Code AND sd.Status_Code = cs.Status_Code AND sd.Status_Type = cs.Status_Type AND sd.Status_Type = cs.Status_Type INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Marine m ON n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID=m.MARINE_ID WHERE sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION = 'DEP DISCHARGE' AND c.DISCHARGE_DATE BETWEEN @StartDate AND @EndDate AND m.rowguid = @RecruiterId
SELECT RecruiterId INTO #TrainingFile FROM USMC.TrainingFile WHERE ID = @TrainingFileId
SELECT Count(dis.nct c.CONTRACT_ID) AS MonthCount, DATEPART(mm, c.DISCHARGE_DATE) AS CalendarMonth FROM #Contract c INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Marine AS m ON c.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID = m.MARINE_ID INNER JOIN #TrainingFile AS . ON m.rowguid = ..RecruiterID GROUP BY DATEPART(mm, c.DISCHARGE_DATE) ORDER BY CalendarMonth
DROP TABLE #Contract DROP TABLE #TrainingFile END
